reviews.review_msg: tons of reading, made me hate communications...but it's only one class, so I'm not letting it affect me too much. She's smart, but all over the place. What are we learning anyway?

Normally I don't think lectures are boring, but this woman gave new definition to the term. She repeated the same lines over and OVER. All I did during lectures was draw. It's still an easy class; all you have to do is parrot her left-wing views.
Lectures were very boring! He was generous and eliminated the final. Roman is funny but the content isn't. Assignments were easy.
